aboutPage.title: About VN Salary Calc
aboutPage.subTitle: Gross ↔ Net Salary Calculator for the Vietnam Market.
aboutPage.intro: VN Salary Calc is a web application designed to help employees and employers in Vietnam easily calculate and understand their salary components, converting from Gross to Net salary and vice versa.
aboutPage.goal1: Provide an accurate calculation tool based on current Vietnamese tax and insurance laws.
aboutPage.goal2: Offer a user-friendly experience, easy to use on all devices.
aboutPage.goal3: Help users better understand how their salary is structured and the deductions involved.
aboutPage.feature1: Calculate salary from Gross to Net and Net to Gross.
aboutPage.feature2: Various options: currency, exchange rate, insurance basis, tax calculation method, region, dependents, nationality.
aboutPage.feature3: Detailed breakdown of deductions: SI, HI, UI, PIT.
aboutPage.feature4: Quickly copy results and export to Excel/PDF.
aboutPage.feature5: Save calculation history in your browser.
aboutPage.disclaimerText: Although we strive to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information and calculations, VN Salary Calc should be used for reference purposes only. Tax and insurance regulations may change, and specific factors at your company may affect the final figures. For the most accurate information, please consult a tax advisor or your HR department.
aboutPage.dataPrivacyText: This application does NOT store any of your data on a server. All calculation history (if you use this feature) is stored locally in your browser, and you have full control (view, delete).
aboutPage.finalThanks: Thank you for using VN Salary Calc!

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis and Detailed Salary Calculation Guide
legalBasis.section1Intro: Below are the legal documents related to salary calculation, including personal income tax, social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance, regional minimum wage, and base salary:
legalBasis.lawPitDetail1: Law No. 04/2007/QH12 (amended and supplemented by Law No. 26/2012/QH13 and Law No. 71/2014/QH13).
legalBasis.lawPitDetail2: Regulates taxable income, tax-exempt income, family allowances, and how to calculate personal income tax (PIT).
legalBasis.lawBhxhDetail2: Specifies mandatory SI contribution rates (8% from employee, 17.5% from employer on the SI contribution base salary).
legalBasis.section2Title: 2. How to Calculate Salary According to Legal Regulations
